attributes.action: Release the NHS Risk Register Assessment
attributes.additional_details: We petition for the NHS Risk Register Assessment to be released immediately. The recent NHS changes have been passed by Parliament despite widespread resistance and concern, and we condemn the decision of ministers to block the release of the risk register that highlights the potential risk that the NHS overhaul may have on our vital health services. The government should aim for complete transparency when possible, and we do not believe there is a justifiable reason for ministers to block the release of this risk assessment, thus we would like it released immediately.
